name: Wo3 Hen3 Chan2
short_description: wo3 hen3 chan2 tries to alleviate the dearth of chinese language tools available for linux.  The plan is to integrate the tools linked from www.mandarintools.com (dictionary, encoding converters/detectors) into a unified, pleasant user experience.  Ha!
